div.p: PHPBenelux Conference is the annual event for the PHP community from Belgium, the Netherlands, Luxembourg and beyond where great content is delivered by experts from all parts of the world and knowledge shared during our amazing socials.

Make sure you join us on January 24 and 25, 2020 for our 11th edition of the conference. With a stellar line-up of speakers we bring you amazing knowledge in our legendary venue in Antwerp, Belgium. Get your tickets today!
Looking forward seeing you all there!
